short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An MLG extension that puts hitmarkers in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension puts hitmarkers in browser. This extension also makes a gun noise when you right click. When you tap on something it makes a click. This extension was designed by MLG people for MLG people.
